vAuto Sales Process Workshop - Columbia Please join us on Thursday, February 26 in Columbia, SC when Tom Murphy, Director of Performance Management, will conduct a Sales Process Workshop.
This workshop is complimentary to all vAuto customers and is recommended for Sales Associates, Sales Management and BDC Staff.
Workshop Overview:
vAuto recognizes that the Internet isn’t a part of the used car business… it is the used car business. With 92% of car shoppers conducting their research online and the average customer only visiting 1.75 dealerships before purchasing, vAuto has customized this training course to introduce a new Internet-driven sales process.
- Review of traditional sales processes and their limitations given the dynamics of today’s Internet-driven marketplace - Identification of tools for communicating transparency and credibility when using market pricing - Training activities designed to help you effectively answer the most common objections without sacrificing margin
Location: Courtyard Columbia Downtown at USC 630 Assembly Street Columbia, SC 29201 (803) 799-7800
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Registration: Please use this link to register your attendees by February 19th. You will have to fill out the form for each person you would like to register. Once you submit the form, you will receive a confirmation email. <http://go.vauto.com/Columbia-Workshop-February-26.html>
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Courtyard Columbia Downtown at USC, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/caecd-courtyard-columbia-downtown-at-usc/> or call the hotel directly at (803) 799-7800.
We hope to see you there! -vAuto Marketing
